text.text: hi can i compare some cards

text: We offer Platinum, Gold, Silver and Bronze cards.
What is the first credit card you want to compare?

Ok, the first one is Bronze Card 
And what's the second card?

sessionParameters.card_one_fee: $15 annual fee for year 1 and then increases to $80 in year 2
sessionParameters.card_one_interest: 10% APR in year 1 and then increases to 20% APR in year 2
sessionParameters.card_two_fee: $0 annual fee for year 1 and then increases to $90 in year 2
sessionParameters.card_two_interest: 10% APR in year 1 and then increases to 20% APR in year 2
